1370: Euerocker moved to Cingel.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Siburgis at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Siburgis, Oudrauen, at age 21.
1371: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Diewiven, at age 22.
1372: Had a son with Siburgis, Robbrecht, at age 23.
1379: Had a son with Siburgis, Sylof, at age 30.
1380: Had a son with Siburgis, Gheeneman, at age 31.
1388: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Marcibilia, at age 39.
1389: Lost his wife Siburgis while she was giving birth to Siburgis in 1389.
